name: 楊元森
objective: This is the second programming language course. Topics covered in this course include basic programming skills of C and C++, objects, classes, control statements, functions, arrays, pointers, strings, and basic data abstraction.
schedule:
Week 1: Introduction to Programming Design  
Week 2: Day-off
Week 3: Introduction to C++
Week 4: Control Statements: if … else
Week 5: Control Statements: for repetition
Week 6: Control Statements: do…while repetition
Week 7: Control Statements: break and continue
Week 8: Control Statements: all together
Week 9: Midterm Simulation
Week 10: Midterm
Week 11: Functions
Week 12: Arrays
Week 13: Multidimensional Arrays
Week 14: Pointers
Week 15: Sequential-Access Files
Week 16: Classes
Week 17: Final Simulation
Week 18: Final
scorePolicy:
Class performance (quiz, activities, discussions): 30% (+/- 10%)
Midterm: 20% (+/- 5%)
Final: 50% (+/- 10%)
materials: Prata, S. (2011). C++ Primer Plus, Addison-Wesley Professional, USA.
